mapper.select: select rs_belongdept, rs_number from rb_saveread where rs_id = #{rsID,jdbcType=BIGINT}

SELECT if(ISNULL(SUM(rs_number)),0,SUM(rs_number)) AS todayNumber FROM rb_saveread WHERE rs_delete = 0 AND rs_type > 0 AND rs_mold = 2
AND rs_belongdept = #{_parameter}

SELECT if(ISNULL(SUM(rs_number)),0,SUM(rs_number)) AS totalNumber, ( SELECT if(ISNULL(SUM(rs_number)),0,SUM(rs_number)) FROM rb_saveread WHERE 1 = 1 AND rs_belongid = #{ID,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND TO_DAYS(rs_createtime) = TO_DAYS(now()) AND rs_delete = 0 AND rs_type > 0 AND rs_mold = 2 ) AS todayNumber , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rb_userplan WHERE plan_userid = #{ID,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND TO_DAYS(plan_createtime) = TO_DAYS(now()) ) AS executePlan , ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rb_userjournal WHERE journal_userid = #{ID,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND journal_status = 0 AND TO_DAYS(journal_createtime) = TO_DAYS(now()) ) AS executeJournal FROM rb_saveread AND rs_type > 0 AND rs_mold = 2
SELECT if(ISNULL(SUM(rs_number)),0,SUM(rs_number)) AS SUM FROM rb_userinfo AS rui, rb_saveread AS rs AND rs_type > 0 AND rs_mold = 2 AND rs_belongid = userinfo_userid
